```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(knitr)
```

```{r}
enrollment_data <- read_xlsx("raw-data/class_enrollment_summary_by_term_9.24.19.xlsx", skip = 3) 
enrollment_data %>%
  filter(`Course Department` == "Government") %>%
  arrange(desc(Total)) %>%
  select('Course Title', 'Course Name', 'Instructor Full Name', Total) %>%
  top_n(5) %>%
  kable()
```
